actions.recommendation: PSA testing: annually, from age 40 if one first-degree relative who had prostate cancer at <65yrs or female relatives diagnosed with BRCA1 or BRCA2 gene mutation breast cancer. From age 45 if history of prostate cancer on either the mother or fatherâ€™s side. Every 2 years from age 50

Optimise diet to reduce cholesterol, take omega 3 supplements 2g daily and coQ10 supplement, use extra-virgin olive oil for raw and low-temperature uses. For high-temperature cooking, avocado oil, coconut oil or ghee
Eat whole unprocessed foods, practice good sleep hygiene, and try to manage your stress
